item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I was never really insane except upon occasions when my heart was touched." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "There is no exquisite beauty… without some strangeness in the proportion." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Sometimes I’m terrified of my heart; of its constant hunger for whatever it is it wants. The way it stops and starts." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Years of love have been forgot, In the hatred of a minute." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "The best things in life make you sweaty." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "The past is a pebble in my shoe." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "And so being young and dipped in folly I fell in love with melancholy." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "A man's grammar, like Caesar's wife, should not only be pure, but above suspicion of impurity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: jessica add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "To love at all is to be vulnerable. Love anything and your heart will be wrung and possibly broken. If you want to make sure of keeping it intact you must give it to no one, not even an animal. Wrap it carefully round with hobbies and little luxuries; avoid all entanglements. Lock it up safe in the casket or coffin of your selfishness. But in that casket, safe, dark, motionless, airless, it will change. It will not be broken; it will become unbreakable, impenetrable, irredeemable. To love is to be vulnerable." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: jessica add a quote by Louise Erdrich
item.description: "Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won't either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could." -- Louise Erdrich

item.title: jessica add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The heart was made to be broken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: jessica add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: jessica add a quote by George Gordon Byron
item.description: "And thus the heart will break, yet brokenly live on." -- George Gordon Byron

item.title: jessica add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "People worry about kids playing with guns, and teenagers watching violent videos; we are scared that some sort of culture of violence will take them over. Nobody worries about kids listening to thousands - literally thousands - of songs about broken hearts and rejection and pain and misery and loss." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: jessica add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken." -- Albert Camus

item.title: jessica add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "Suffering has been stronger than all other teaching, and has taught me to understand what your heart used to be. I have been bent and broken, but - I hope - into a better shape." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: jessica add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Someday you're gonna look back on this moment of your life as such a sweet time of grieving. You'll see that you were in mourning and your heart was broken, but your life was changing..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: jessica add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Perhaps this is what the stories meant when they called somebody heartsick. Your heart and your stomach and your whole insides felt empty and hollow and aching." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: jessica add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Hearts are breakable," Isabelle said. "And I think even when you heal, you're never what you were before"." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: jessica add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "The only thing a boyfriend was good for was a shattered heart." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: jessica add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Only time can heal your broken heart. Just as only time can heal his broken arms and legs." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: jessica add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "Love and I once had a great relationship, but I fear we've broken up. It cheated on me, wrecked my heart, and then went on to date other people. A lot of other people. And I can't stand to watch it, since love's going to cheat on them too." -- David Levithan

item.title: jessica add a quote by Kristan Higgins
item.description: "I had to get over [him]. For months now, a stone had been sitting on my heart. I'd shed a lot of tears over [him], lost a lot of sleep, eaten a lot of cake batter. Somehow, I had to move on. [Life] would be hell if I didn't shake loose from the grip he had on my heart. I most definitely didn't want to keep feeling this way, alone in a love affair meant for two. Even if he'd felt like The One. Even if I'd always thought we'd end up together. Even if he still had a choke chain on my heart." -- Kristan Higgins

item.title: jessica add a quote by Danka V.
item.description: "What irritated me most in that entire situation was the fact that I wasn’t feeling humiliated, or annoyed, or even fooled. Betrayal was what I felt, my heart broken not just by a guy I was in love with, but also by, as I once believed, a true friend." -- Danka V.

item.title: jessica add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The most terrible thing about it is not that it breaks one’s heart—hearts are made to be broken—but that it turns one’s heart to stone." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: jessica add a quote by Charlie Sheen
item.description: "The best way to not get your heart broken, is pretending you don't have one." -- Charlie Sheen

item.title: jessica add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "Well I got a bad liver and broken heart, yeah,I drunk me a river since you tore me apart" -- Tom Waits

item.title: jessica add a quote by Pearl Buck
item.description: "There are many ways of breaking a heart. Stories were full of hearts broken by love, but what really broke a heart was taking away its dream -- whatever that dream might be." -- Pearl Buck

item.title: jessica add a quote by Emily Brontë
item.description: "You teach me now how cruel you've been - cruel and false. Why did you despise me? Why did you betray your own heart, Cathy? I have not one word of comfort. You deserve this. You have killed yourself. Yes, you may kiss me, and cry; and wring out my kisses and tears: they'll blight you - they'll damn you. You loved me - what right had you to leave me? What right - answer me - for the poor fancy you felt for Linton? Because misery, and degradation, and death, and nothing that God or Satan could inflict would have parted us, you, of your own will did it. I have not broken your heart - you have broken it; and in breaking it, you have broken mine." -- Emily Brontë
